name: New Collection 2013 Rich Earth Vintage Blanket 1
description:
Our new collection for 2013!

This collection features warm earth tones. With a classic country feel, the colours will compliment any room, giving a true chic style. 
This blanket is a lovely gift for older children and adults - a gift to be passed down through generations. 

Created by hand, each blanket is individual and lovingly made with care.  We have 3 further blankets of similar colour available for immediate purchase. Custom orders also accepted.

Made of 100% acrylic, hand wash.

Size 31 x 31 inches (79cm x 79cm) 
64 squares of colour

name: SALE! Circles of Colour, Blanket 1
description:

Circles of colour brighten a dull day and draw the sun into the room.  From classic to contemporary, this blanket is right at home in a traditional home or to spice up a sleek white room.

These items are individually designed and unique in colour combination. You will receive the blanket that is on display here.

Size 48 x 31 inches (122cm x 79cm)

name: Rustic Circles, Blanket 1
description:
This thick white blanket will be a keepsake in any home. Classic styling. Colour is soft white.

Made of 100% acrylic. Hand wash.

Size 27 x 32 inches (69cm x 82cm)

name: Cinnamon, Orange & Clove Scented Sachets
description:
We have taken our own locally grown oranges in Portugal to blend this yummy comforting scent. Ideal for complimenting a gift package or on it's own, our crochet scent sachets will become a favourite.

Long lasting scent is ensured by using a fixative of organic, natural orris root. 

Available in Jade or Crimson Red.

Please note, you will receive an item in the colour of your choice. All our products are individually created by hand and may exhibit signs of uniqueness unlike the one shown.

name: Circles of Colour, Designer Wooden Clothespegs
description:
Unique to Andrea Lee Collections, our bespoke crochet design has been transferred onto large wooden clips and given a shabby chic style, with a raised shiny resin finish and an outdoor sealant. 

Bag clips, cards strung on twine, hanging the laundry out to dry, clip gift tags to ribbon as a unique wrapping option, favour bags (clip the name tag on). Easily glue magnets on one side to be used as photo holders in the kitchen.

Give as a small gift to compliment our Circles of Colour Collection.
